body.p:
Danville Virginia Oct 16th 1865
To his Excellency The Governor of Kentucky

We the undersigned Mayor and Aldermen Merchants Tobacconists Lawyers Manufacturers and Brokers of the Town of Danville and State of Va most respectfully recommend that Thomas S. Davidson Clerk of the Hustings and Circuit Court for the Town and State aforesaid be appointed a Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky in the State of Virginia There not being in our opinion a sufficiency of Commissioners to faciilitate the Transaction of business

Very Respectfully
Will T Clark Mayor
Wm B Millner ald
J. J. Crews Ald
Jno A Smith Ald
Benjamin Green Commonwealth's Attor
John W Holland President of the town council
E B & J H Estes
R. E. Withers Cashr Bk of Va
W W Kern Son & Co
Davis & Moreley
Crews Rodmhizer & Co

Comr of Deeds
Virginia
Thos L. Davdson
Comd
23d Oct 1865
